text: Saint-Bois is a former commune in the Ain department in eastern France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune Arboys-en-Bugey.Arrêté préfectoral 29 September 2015 ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ain department ==References== Category:Former communes in Ain Category:2016 disestablishments in France
title: Saint-Bois
